name: Escape the Dungeon (laurenk)
description:
Once a year a single person must enter the dungeon.

You are the unlucky soul chosen to enter the dungeon this year

However, there may be a chance to escape, your only chance at finding out is to venture further in

My first attempt at a 3D first person horror(ish) game with some very basic puzzles, 

may build on it  further in the future if I feel like it (or if I feel like procrastinating further from my current project hehe...).  

Mostly just an excuse to practice more 3D modelling and the 3D side of Unity :3

(music and sound effects are from https://www.zapsplat.com)
